children.text: The box gutter in this area has not been sealed to the rainhead/sump, creating a weak point in the gutter design that is susceptible to leaking.
he Victorian Building Authority’s Box Gutter Design Fact Sheet states that
‘Box gutters must be sealed to rainheads and sumps’ .
This box gutter must be properly sealed to the rainhead/sump to ensure proper water discharge in accordance with Australian Standard AS 3500 – Plumbing and Drainage.
